onDataChanged().Description: Called when the overall data changes.

onDataRangeChanged(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items changes.
onDataRangeChanged(int, int).FullName: public void onDataRangeChanged (int position, int count)

removeObserver(com.google.android.gms.co.Description: Unregister the given observer from receiving change notifications.

onDataRangeInserted(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items is inserted.
onDataRangeInserted(int, int).FullName: public void onDataRangeInserted (int position, int count)

onDataRangeMoved(int, int, int).Description: Called when a range of items is moved.
onDataRangeMoved(int, int, int).FullName: public void onDataRangeMoved (int fromPosition, int toPosition, int count)

onDataRangeRemoved(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items is removed.
onDataRangeRemoved(int, int).FullName: public void onDataRangeRemoved (int position, int count)

hasObservers().Description: Returns true if this has any registered observers.

addObserver(com.google.android.gms.commo.Description: Register the given observer for receiving change notifications.

ClassDesc: Utility class for managing a set of observers and distributing their notifications.
